summary: The module creates synthetic NetCDF test datasets (including 3‑D, 4‑D, surface and profile fields) derived from ECMWF variable ranges and automatically generates the corresponding mswms configuration needed to serve these files via the MSS WMS service.
business_intent: Enable rapid development, testing and demonstration of the MSS WMS system by supplying ready‑made meteorological demo data and server settings, eliminating the dependency on real observational data.
